item.title: Version 1.4.0
item.description:
ÔøΩ History Center & Reports

üöö Delivery History Revamp

  • New Detail View: Completely redesigned the Delivery History Detail screen. It now features a clean, summary-first layout that highlights key metrics like Average Completion and Review Count upfront.
  • Styled Cards: Weekly reviews are now presented as expandable cards with clear visual indicators for Week Number, Date, and Completion Score.
  • Search: You can now search for delivery reviews by Class, Subject, or Teacher name directly from the history list.

üìã Consolidated Remarks

  • Dedicated Report View: View all remarks for a subject in one place with the new "Consolidated Remarks" sheet.
  • Copy to Clipboard: Added ability to copy the Full Report (all remarks formatted for WhatsApp/Email) or Single Remarks with just one click.
  • Responsive Experience: Opens as a centered Dialog on Desktop and a Bottom Sheet on Mobile for the best experience on any device.

ÔøΩÔ∏è Desktop Enhancements

  • Dialogs vs Sheets: Optimized interactions to use modal dialogs on larger screens, reducing mouse travel and improving focus.
  • Grid Layout: History cards now adapt beautifully to grid layouts on wide screens.

‚ú® General improvements

  • Fixed layout issues in history cards.
  • Improved scrolling performance in long history lists.
